name: Linda Thompson

'''Linda Thompson''' (''[[n√©e]]'' '''Pettifer''', later '''Peters'''; born 23 August 1947) is an English singer-songwriter.

Thompson is one of the most recognised names and voices in the [[British folk rock]] movement of the 1970s and 1980s, in collaboration with fellow British folk rock musician, guitarist [[Richard Thompson (musician)|Richard Thompson]], to whom she was married for ten years, and later as a solo artist.
